nav.div: East Rochester Union Free School District » News » What's New » School Closure Meal Program

div.div: School Closure Meal Program Begins March 18

br.br:
The East Rochester Union Free School District is committed to providing meals to children in need during the school closure. Beginning Wednesday, March 18, the District will offer breakfast and lunch meals for pick up between 11 a.m. and 1:00 p.m. Monday through Friday.
The program is FREE for children age 18 and younger. There is NO income requirement or registration needed.
The program will be conducted drive-thru style. Just drive through the Jr/Sr High School traffic loop and pick up meals!
At pick up, both lunch and breakfast will be provided at the same time. The breakfast is for the following morning.
Adults over the age of 18 can purchase breakfast for $2 and Lunch for $4.

div.div: 222 Woodbine Avenue, East Rochester, NY 14445 | Phone (585) 248-6302 | Fax (585) 586-3254
